Articles.Content:
I'm having an issue in career mode where any science I do, whether it be from a thermometer, EVA report, crew report etc will not show up to be used in the tech tree.  It doesn't matter if I transmit the data or recover it with the vessel.  In the post mission review, it shows up as earned science.  If I complete a contract that rewards me with science, I do see that show up to be used.  Below is a list of my installed mods, does anyone know what might be causing this, or even if not, help me scale down which mods to target deactivating to try and get it fixed?  Thanks to anyone who can help!

 

  •  ASET Agency (ASETAgency 1.0)
  • ASET Props (ASETProps 1.5)
  • AT Utils (AT-Utils v1.10.1)
  • B9 Part Switch (B9PartSwitch v2.20.0)
  • BetterTimeWarpContinued (BetterTimeWarpCont 2.3.13)
  • BonVoyage (BonVoyage 1:1.4.1)
  • Breaking Ground (BreakingGround-DLC 1.7.1)
  • Chatterer (Chatterer 0.9.99)
  • Chatterer Extended (ChattererExtended 0.6.2)
  • ClickThrough Blocker (ClickThroughBlocker 1:2.1.10.18)
  • CommNet Relays (ContractConfigurator-CommNetRelays v2.1.0)
  • Community Category Kit (CommunityCategoryKit v112.0.1)
  • Community Resource Pack (CommunityResourcePack v112.0.1)
  • Community Tech Tree (CommunityTechTree 1:3.4.4)
  • Community Terrain Texture Pack (CommunityTerrainTexturePack 1:1.0.4)
  • Configurable Containers (ConfigurableContainers 2.6.2.1)
  • Contract Configurator (ContractConfigurator v2.2.2.0)

  • Distant Object Enhancement /L default config (DistantObject-default v2.1.1.11r2)
  • Docking Port Alignment Indicator (DockingPortAlignmentIndicator 6.10.0.0)
  • Dynamic Battery Storage (DynamicBatteryStorage 2:2.2.5.0)
  • Easy Vessel Switch (EVS) (EasyVesselSwitch 2.3)
  • Environmental Visual Enhancements - Stock Planet Config files (EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements-HR 2:EVE-1.2.2-1)
